about_the_game:
The My Lovely Empress artbook showcases the visual development of the continent of Ashuwa and the many people (and Yaoguai!) that dwell inside it. Gain an in-depth understanding of My Lovely Empress with these insights into the design process behind characters, nations, and more as you witness Game Changer’s biggest title yet!

How to access

The artbook will be downloaded in the folder where the game is installed in your computer (typical address would be: Program Files (X86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Lovely Empress).
